instructions:
Cut dried beef into 1/2 x 1 inch pieces separate and set aside. Sauté the green pepper and onion in
margarine for about 5 minutes in a 2 quart saucepan. Add mushroom soup and stir until smooth. Then blend
in milk. Add peas, mushroom pieces and dried beef. Stir until hot. Add milk if necessary to reach desired
thickness. Serve on toast or biscuits. Makes about 2 cups.
ingredients: 1 can (11 oz) cream of mushroom soup
name: Creamed Chipped Beef
